title: So stupid
text: Why make another app to download and use up storage on my phone?? Just make it part of Instagram. I tried it out. The dumbest part was when I clicked on a thread that was shown on Instagram that I wanted to see, it took me to threads and didn’t show me the post I clicked on to see. Why show threads on Instagram if you can’t 1. See them on the app you are currently using, and 2. See them on the threads app after clicking it. Also, Apple needs to allow 0 star reviews.

title: Instagram as a whole just fell off
text: My rate is actually 0 stars . Everything was working properly until 2/16 . Every-time i log into instagram / threads it says “error there was a problem with your request “ The only way to access my ig is to keep resetting my password. Very annoying. It’s been happening to others as well so it has to be some type of glitch . Instagram fix this issue, otherwise i won’t be using this app any longer .

title: deleted so fast
text:
this could have committed to being a (pre-musk) twitter clone and rocked, but like everything else meta does they feel like they need to rip something off and put their own special (clunky, useless, annoying) spin on it. after threads realized i was interested in art, it proceeded to show me pretty much nothing but ai generated content. threads would not let me block posts with the word ‘ai’, so i noped out after that. in my time there, i was also subjected to some pretty garbage political content i had never interacted with or shown interest in before. eventually i did interact with it and the stupid app censored anything “mean” i had to say (including the word ‘dumb’) but somehow let some pretty messed up content land right on my feed.

ridiculous app by a ridiculous company.
